amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used for the purpose of conducting combat operations in Afghanistan after December 31, 2014.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds for the purpose of conducting combat operations in Afghanistan after December 31, 2014.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lee (CA) amendment (A062) Failed by recorded vote: 153 - 260 (Roll no. 332).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lee (CA) amendment (A062) Failed by recorded vote: 153 - 260 (Roll no. 332).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A062) offered by Ms. Lee (CA).
